text: The 2 arrondissements of the Tarn department are: # Arrondissement of Albi, (prefecture of the Tarn department: Albi) with 163 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 191,150 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Castres, (subprefecture: Castres) with 151 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 195,298 in 2016. ==History== In 1800 the arrondissements of Albi, Castres, Gaillac and Lavaur were established. The arrondissements of Gaillac and Lavaur were disbanded in 1926.Historique du Tarn ==References== Tarn
title: Arrondissements of the Tarn department
